name: Destroy Blocks (Peanut Panda)
description:
'Destroy Blocks' is a game about big explosions and general destruction. If it moves, shoot it. If it doesn't, shoot it some more. 

Do you have what it takes to become the new Master of Destruction? If so, then start firing on things and set a new high score!

- Level up
- Upgrade your weapons
- Set a highscore
- Avoid the creatures
- Lots of explosions
- Visit outerspace
- Shoot everything you see
